title: Bug 18268: Not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description: Bug 18268: Eclipse is not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories. Build version: 200205291235. Steps to reproduce the issue:
OB: Upon opening the about dialog, there is a main image visible.
EB: Upon opening the about dialog, there is no main image. Expectation: It should have found it.
SR:
1. Exit Eclipse.
2. Copy the file <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif> into an NL-specific subdirectory; i.e., move it to <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/nl/en/eclipselg.gif>.
3. Start Eclipse.
